dct_title_s: Jerusalem / reproduced by Sami Hadawi , former Palestine Government Official of the Department of Land Settlements of the Department of Land Settlement from the Palestine Survey Maps and Taxation Records.
dct_description_sm: Includes schedule of Arab ownership. Includes: "Schedule of area of ownership." Map shows: armistice line, no mans land, urban tax assessment blocks, Moslem and Christian owned property, Jewish owned property; United Nations controlled areas. Locates the Augusta Victoria Hospital used by the Lutheran Society for refugees. Map has a related volume: Land ownership in Palestine / by Sami Hadawi. New York : Palestine Arab Refugee Office. 1957. 46 pages, maps. A reduce version of this map is on page 30. Text is filed in Annex A - Forrestal. Call number: HD 1265.P18 H12
dct_publisher_sm: New York, NY : Palestine Arab Refugee Office, [1960?]
